UniprotID	Q8TAX9
Accession	Q8TAX9;B4DKK7;Q7Z377;Q8WY76;Q9NX71;Q9P163
EntryName	GSDMB_HUMAN
ProteinName	Gasdermin-B (Gasdermin-like protein) [Cleaved into: Gasdermin-B, N-terminal (GSDMB-NT) (p30); Gasdermin-B, C-terminal (GSDMB-CT) (p16)]
GeneName	GSDMB GSDML PP4052 PRO2521
Length	416
Function	Precursor of a pore-forming protein that acts as a downstream mediator of granzyme-mediated cell death (PubMed:32299851). This form constitutes the precursor of the pore-forming protein: upon cleavage, the released N-terminal moiety (Gasdermin-B, N-terminal) binds to membranes and forms pores, triggering pyroptosis (PubMed:32299851). Also acts as a regulator of epithelial cell repair independently of programmed cell death: translocates to the plasma membrane and promotes epithelial maintenance and repair by regulating PTK2/FAK-mediated phosphorylation of PDGFA (PubMed:35021065).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cell membrane
Disorder	0.0253,0.0202,0.0163,0.0218,0.0372,0.0380,0.0531,0.0555,0.0734,0.0909,0.1137,0.1162,0.1373,0.1184,0.1162,0.2002,0.1852,0.1048,0.1162,0.1184,0.1028,0.1671,0.2258,0.1881,0.1914,0.1229,0.0817,0.0780,0.0555,0.0356,0.0356,0.0380,0.0454,0.0749,0.0909,0.0704,0.0364,0.0372,0.0424,0.0646,0.0618,0.0433,0.0433,0.0454,0.0909,0.0543,0.0851,0.0948,0.0780,0.1323,0.1229,0.0734,0.0690,0.0734,0.0765,0.0765,0.1476,0.2364,0.1424,0.1323,0.1373,0.1476,0.1501,0.1501,0.1449,0.1449,0.1476,0.1501,0.2328,0.2715,0.2609,0.3149,0.4119,0.3019,0.3019,0.2193,0.1449,0.1449,0.1611,0.1942,0.2817,0.2752,0.2609,0.3460,0.3529,0.2783,0.1969,0.2164,0.2064,0.1349,0.1554,0.1583,0.1914,0.1184,0.2094,0.1373,0.2002,0.2849,0.2783,0.1671,0.2364,0.2328,0.1449,0.1449,0.1449,0.1424,0.2064,0.2034,0.2645,0.1881,0.2680,0.2436,0.2645,0.2503,0.2503,0.2436,0.3286,0.3392,0.2609,0.1881,0.2645,0.2609,0.1852,0.2951,0.3053,0.3053,0.2918,0.2193,0.2951,0.3019,0.3910,0.3182,0.3392,0.2258,0.2258,0.2064,0.2094,0.2002,0.1349,0.2129,0.2918,0.3149,0.3249,0.4186,0.3392,0.2541,0.1852,0.1424,0.2094,0.2224,0.2258,0.1554,0.2292,0.2002,0.2436,0.2399,0.3494,0.3566,0.3599,0.3667,0.3460,0.3460,0.3494,0.3392,0.3321,0.3321,0.4051,0.3807,0.3321,0.3286,0.3249,0.2503,0.3182,0.3149,0.3182,0.3840,0.3215,0.3117,0.2364,0.2292,0.3053,0.3087,0.3117,0.3117,0.3117,0.3117,0.3215,0.3286,0.3494,0.4901,0.5296,0.5382,0.6322,0.5577,0.4766,0.4725,0.3910,0.4582,0.4017,0.4725,0.4831,0.4051,0.3566,0.2609,0.2849,0.2988,0.2918,0.3566,0.3566,0.4119,0.3807,0.3249,0.3149,0.2470,0.3117,0.3019,0.3117,0.2849,0.2817,0.3392,0.3392,0.3356,0.3983,0.4541,0.4476,0.4476,0.4409,0.4476,0.4330,0.4292,0.3740,0.3774,0.3983,0.4051,0.4831,0.4766,0.5577,0.5620,0.6661,0.6620,0.6755,0.6712,0.5665,0.5901,0.5992,0.7080,0.6806,0.6661,0.5807,0.5017,0.4979,0.5992,0.5055,0.5139,0.5139,0.5176,0.5139,0.5139,0.4940,0.5296,0.4685,0.3840,0.4051,0.4766,0.3910,0.3599,0.3774,0.3053,0.2364,0.2988,0.3631,0.3840,0.3840,0.3740,0.3631,0.3667,0.3667,0.3019,0.3215,0.3356,0.3182,0.3182,0.3910,0.3910,0.3
